name: connect4
description: play a fantastic game of connect4

options.name: emoji
options.description: specify an emoji to use as your marker (press TAB after typing it in)

options.name: new
options.description: create a new game (no custom board size, maybe ever)

options.name: override
options.description: trigger a hard reset of the board and players

options.name: kick
options.description: remove a user from the game (this is so sad)
